ABOUT_ME.TITLE: About me
ABOUT_ME.INTRO: Hi there! I'm Florian, a frontend developer from Cologne, Germany with a passion for crafting user-friendly digital experiences. I focus on translating complex ideas into appealing, functional designs, always with an eye for detail and a solutions-driven approach. Let's team up and bring something extraordinary to life

LOCATION.TEXT: Although I am based in Cologne, I am not tied to a fixed location. I work flexibly remotely and support companies throughout Germany with my expertise to implement digital projects efficiently.

DEVELOPMENT.TEXT: From the initial idea to the completion of your project, I will guide you through all stages of development. Open to new challenges and always eager to expand my knowledge and skills, I work with you to create a solution tailored to your needs and those of your users.

PROGRAMMING.TEXT: In my field, programming goes beyond merely writing code; it's a creative approach to solving problems. I understand both technical development and the importance of user-centered design for creating engaging, intuitive experiences.

SKILLS.TITLE: Skills
SKILLS.DESCRIPTION: I have worked on various projects using different front-end technologies. I enjoy trying out new tools and techniques to learn and keep up with the latest in web development.
SKILLS.CONTACT_TEXT: Feel free to contact me. I look forward to expanding on my previous knowledge.

LEARNING.TITLE: Continually
LEARNING.SUBTITLE: learning
LEARNING.INTEREST: I have special interest in learning

PORTFOLIO.INTRO: Here is a selection of my projects - interact with the projects to see my skills in action.

JOIN.DESCRIPTION: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories

EL_POLLO_LOCO.DESCRIPTION: Jump, run and throw game based on object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and beer bottles to fight against the crazy boss chicken

HEADER.TITLE: Got a problem to solve?
HEADER.DESCRIPTION: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.

ERRORS.MIN_LENGTH: Name must be at least 2 characters long
Message must be at least 5 characters long

PRIVACY.AGREEMENT: and agree to the processing of my data as outlined.
